workshoptitle: Build a GenAI-Powered Financial Services Loan Approval Application with Oracle 23ai

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always first. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Demo User Story
tutorials.description: Labs that follow the introduction are numbered, starting with Lab 1

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Build Hands-on Environment
tutorials.description: This is a step-by-step guide showcasing how the demo instance is navigated

tutorials.title: Need Help?
